long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🐦 Flap your way to fun with Flappy Bird for Chrome! 🐦

Flappy Bird for Chrome is a faithful adaptation of the popular mobile game that took the world by storm. It’s easy to learn and incredibly addictive. The retro graphics and competitive leaderboard keep you coming back for more.

👉 How to play: 👈

Click on the screen, or use your spacebar to get started.
Fly the bird as far as you can without hitting a pipe!
Challenge your friends and see who can get the highest score!
👍 Why you’ll love Flappy Bird for Chrome: 👍
No internet required: play offline anytime, anywhere.
No ads or in-app purchases: enjoy this captivating arcade game without any hidden charges or distractions.
Safe and secure: the extension requires minimal permissions and does not collect or share any personal data.
🌟 Don’t miss this chance to relive the magic of Flappy Bird on your Chrome browser. 

🌟Install Flappy Bird for Chrome now and start your Flappy Bird adventure! 

🕹️You can play more games by clicking on the More game link at the bottom of the pop up or you can try this game with the Web version by clicking on the Web Version beside the More game link.
